message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic product that I believe will be incredibly valuable to you. Given its potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,150,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so please let me know your thoughts.

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget allows me to pay up to $1,000,000. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,000,000. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I understand your position, but the value of this product significantly exceeds $1,000,000.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,100,000 to reach a fair deal. This is my final offer, as I already have a buyer at $1,000,000.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to adjust the price. However, my maximum budget remains at $1,000,000. I am unable to increase my offer. I hope we can still find a way to come to an agreement.
